title: Bloomberg Markets: Apple Value Touches $900 Billion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Apple Value Touches $900 Billion
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Mark Gurman\u0010Technology Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010 \u0010Julie Verhage\u0010Stock Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Apple outlook still largely bullish after earnings as the company briefly became the U.S.’s first $900 billion company, on the same day its stores around the world were inundated withcustomers trying to get their hands on the new iPhone X.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
